title: 2,200-year-old gold coin depicting ancient Egyptian queen discovered in Jerusalem
summary: Archaeologists in Jerusalem have discovered a 2,270-year-old gold coin with Queen Berenice II of Egypt and the inscription "of the Queen," suggesting she was a powerful and influential monarch.

title: ‘People Are So Proud of This’: How River and Lake Water Is Cooling Buildings
summary: Networks of pipes and heat exchangers can transfer excess heat from buildings into nearby bodies of water—but as the world warms, the cooling potential of some water courses is now diminishing.

title: I Tried McDonald's New Gold Sauce & TBH It Rivals Chick-fil-A
summary: I'll take it by the spoonful, thanks.
